Title: Deanimate the Reanimated
Description:
The admiral's asked me to take care of a major problem, but my specialty's in healing, not fighting!

The pandaren in the camp here have told me that something is animating the statues to the northeast at Mogujia.

Will you help me out, $n? We can't afford to have a fight with an army of statues right now.
ObjectivesText: Destroy any 14 Terracotta Warriors or Terracotta Guardians.
CompletionText: Please tell me that you have the Mogujia situation under control. Please?
RewardText: Alright! Looks like we won't have a bunch of statues to worry about any more. Good work, $p!
